ayahs.text: sab~aHa lil~ahi maA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wahuwa {loEaziyzu {loHakiymu
lahu, muloku {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi yuHoYi. wayumiytu wahuwa EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN

huwa {l~a*iY xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa fiY sit~api >ay~aAmK vum~a {sotawaY` EalaY {loEaro$i yaEolamu maA yaliju fiY {lo>aroDi wamaA yaxoruju minohaA wamaA yanzilu mina {ls~amaA^'i wamaA yaEoruju fiyhaA wahuwa maEakumo >ayona maA kuntumo wa{ll~ahu bimaA taEomaluwna baSiyrN
l~ahu, muloku {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wa<ilaY {ll~ahi turojaEu {lo>umuwru

wamaA lakumo >al~aA tunfiquwA@ fiY sabiyli {ll~ahi walil~ahi miyra`vu {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi laA yasotawiY minkum m~ano >anfaqa min qaboli {lofatoHi waqa`tala >uw@la`^}ika >aEoZamu darajapF m~ina {l~a*iyna >anfaquwA@ min[ baEodu waqa`taluwA@ wakul~FA waEada {ll~ahu {loHusonaY` wa{ll~ahu bimaA taEomaluwna xabiyrN
m~an *aA {l~a*iY yuqoriDu {ll~aha qaroDFA HasanFA fayuDa`Eifahu, lahu, walahu,^ >ajorN kariymN

yawoma taraY {lomu&ominiyna wa{lomu&omina`ti yasoEaY` nuwruhum bayona >ayodiyhimo wabi>ayoma`nihim bu$oraY`kumu {loyawoma jan~a`tN tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru xa`lidiyna fiyhaA *a`lika huwa {lofawozu {loEaZiymu

yunaAduwnahumo >alamo nakun m~aEakumo qaAluwA@ balaY` wala`kin~akumo fatantumo >anfusakumo watarab~aSotumo wa{rotabotumo wagar~atokumu {lo>amaAniY~u Hat~aY` jaA^'a >amoru {ll~ahi wagar~akum bi{ll~ahi {logaruwru
fa{loyawoma laA yu&oxa*u minkumo fidoyapN walaA mina {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ ma>owaY`kumu {ln~aAru hiYa mawolaY`kumo wabi}osa {lomaSiyru

>alamo ya>oni lil~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ >an taxo$aEa quluwbuhumo li*ikori {ll~ahi wamaA nazala mina {loHaq~i walaA yakuwnuwA@ ka{l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {lokita`ba min qabolu faTaAla Ealayohimu {lo>amadu faqasato quluwbuhumo wakaviyrN m~inohumo fa`siquwna

<in~a {lomuS~ad~iqiyna wa{lomuS~ad~iqa`ti wa>aqoraDuwA@ {ll~aha qaroDFA HasanFA yuDa`Eafu lahumo walahumo >ajorN kariymN

wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ bi{ll~ahi warusulihi.^ >uw@la`^}ika humu {lS~id~iyquwna wa{l$~uhadaA^'u Einda rab~ihimo lahumo >ajoruhumo wanuwruhumo wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA^ >uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {lojaHiymi

saAbiquw^A@ <ilaY` magofirapK m~in r~ab~ikumo wajan~apK EaroDuhaA kaEaroDi {ls~amaA^'i wa{lo>aroDi >uEid~ato lil~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ bi{ll~ahi warusulihi. *a`lika faDolu {ll~ahi yu&otiyhi man ya$aA^'u wa{ll~ahu *uw {lofaDoli {loEaZiymi
maA^ >aSaAba min m~uSiybapK fiY {lo>aroDi walaA fiY^ >anfusikumo <il~aA fiY kita`bK m~in qaboli >an n~abora>ahaA^ <in~a *a`lika EalaY {ll~ahi yasiyrN
l~ikayolaA ta>osawoA@ EalaY` maA faAtakumo walaA taforaHuwA@ bimaA^ 'aAtaY`kumo wa{ll~ahu laA yuHib~u kul~a muxotaAlK faxuwrK
{l~a*iyna yaboxaluwna waya>omuruwna {ln~aAsa bi{lobuxoli waman yatawal~a fa<in~a {ll~aha huwa {loganiY~u {loHamiydu

walaqado >arosalonaA nuwHFA wa<ibora`hiyma wajaEalonaA fiY *ur~iy~atihimaA {ln~ubuw~apa wa{lokita`ba faminohum m~uhotadK wakaviyrN m~inohumo fa`siquwna

vum~a qaf~ayonaA EalaY`^ 'aAva`rihim birusulinaA waqaf~ayonaA biEiysaY {boni maroyama wa'aAtayona`hu {lo<injiyla wajaEalonaA fiY quluwbi {l~a*iyna {t~abaEuwhu ra>ofapF waraHomapF warahobaAniy~apF {botadaEuwhaA maA katabona`haA Ealayohimo <il~aA {botigaA^'a riDowa`ni {ll~ahi famaA raEawohaA Haq~a riEaAyatihaA fa_#aAtayonaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ minohumo >ajorahumo wakaviyrN m~inohumo fa`siquwna

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ {t~aquwA@ {ll~aha wa'aAminuwA@ birasuwlihi. yu&otikumo kifolayoni min r~aHomatihi. wayajoEal l~akumo nuwrFA tamo$uwna bihi. wayagofiro lakumo wa{ll~ahu gafuwrN r~aHiymN
